args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- For any complex number z, cos(i*z) = cosh z. -/
theorem cos_of_I_mul (z : ℂ) : cos (I * z) = cosh z := by sorry

/-- For any complex number z, sin(i*z) = i * sinh z. -/
theorem sin_of_I_mul (z : ℂ) : sin (I * z) = I * sinh z := by sorry
